alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 26 at 6:44PM MDT until June 26 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 644 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Gun Barrel, or 28 miles northeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Laramie County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
